channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Cavaliers break ground on new state-of-the-art training facility scheduled to open in 2027
item.description: Cleveland guard Donovan Mitchell grabbed a shovel and was one of the dignitaries who took part in a groundbreaking ceremony for the Cavaliersâ€™ new, state-of-the-art downtown training facility scheduled to open in 2027.

item.title: Town fines resident who projected Trump sign onto municipal water tower
item.description: A town in Massachusetts has sent a cease-and-desist letter to a property owner who projected a Trump sign onto the side of a town water tower.

item.title: St. Louis schools, struggling to get kids to classes, suspend bus vendor
item.description: A statement from St. Louis Public Schools says the district has suspended routes operated by one vendor after determining the buses violated safety standards.
